definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: The pity of it is that an intelligent man appears to have been seduced by the sound of his own voice.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，這位智者似乎被自己的聲音誤導了。

sentences.english: The leader had joined the army much earlier after graduating from high school.
sentences.chinese: 這位班長自打高中畢業後就入伍了。

sentences.english: Mengsk approached the smaller man and stood before him, an intimidating presence.
sentences.chinese: 蒙克斯以威迫的姿態靠近並站在這位小矮人前面。

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 這位剩女所做的就是念了一段經。

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 這位新總理主要從年輕人中物色人選組建政府。

sentences.english: This congressman is clever at making scores off hecklers at public meetings.
sentences.chinese: 這位國會議員擅長在公衆集會上駁倒詰難者。

sentences.english: Duggan, a father of four, died of a single gunshot wound to the chest, an inquest at north London Coroner's Court heard on Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 驗屍報告稱，這位四歲小孩的父親被槍擊中胸腔致死。

sentences.english: Entirely devoted to the Party, the young soldier gave his life for his country.
sentences.chinese: 對黨無限忠誠，這位年輕的士兵爲祖國獻出了生命。

sentences.english: My acquaintance confirmed that his fellow postmen were neither terribly nice nor terribly nasty.
sentences.chinese: 我這位熟人證明，他的同事們既不太好，也不太差。

sentences.english: The guy in blue told me they were teasing the silk.
sentences.chinese: 穿藍衣的這位老哥告訴我他們正梳理的是Silk。

sentences.english: The young boxer has copped the prize of the first round.
sentences.chinese: 這位年輕的拳擊手已獲得了第一回合的勝利。

sentences.english: The lawyer has been appointed to mediate between the employers and the union leaders.
sentences.chinese: 這位律師被指定在僱主和工會領導人之間進行調解。

sentences.english: So the widow one day entreated me to sing it to her thus.
sentences.chinese: 因此這位寡婦有一天請求我用這調子唱給她聽。

sentences.english: The actress is dressed by the best-known designer in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 這位女明星的衣服是由巴黎最知名的設計師提供的。

sentences.english: Nothing can beguile the old man.
sentences.chinese: 什麼也欺騙不了這位老人。
